title: Calories in Lemon Juice
meta_description: Discover calories in lemon juice per 100 g, including carbs, protein, fat, and other nutrients for fresh, raw varieties.
assumptions: Fresh, raw lemon juice; no added sugar, preservatives, or dilution.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by freshness, lemon variety, processing, and added ingredients. Check labels for bottled products.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of fresh lemon juice contains about 22 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tablespoon of lemon juice?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for 1 tbsp (15 g) of fresh lemon juice.
Yes, 100 g has 6.9 g carbs, mostly natural sugars, with 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does lemon juice have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.4 g protein and 0.2 g fat per 100 g.
Adding sugar increases calories; e.g., 1 tsp adds ~16 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: Difference between fresh and bottled lemon juice calories?
faqs.a: Bottled may have slightly more (up to 25 kcal/100 g) due to preservatives or concentration.
